effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.

short_effect.x-y: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.

flavor_text.x-y: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
